describeentitiesdetectionv2job.name: DescribeEntitiesDetectionV2Job
describeentitiesdetectionv2job.description: Grants permission to describe the properties of a medical entity detection job that you have submitted

describeicd10cminferencejob.name: DescribeICD10CMInferenceJob
describeicd10cminferencejob.description: Grants permission to describe the properties of an ICD-10-CM linking job that you have submitted

describephidetectionjob.name: DescribePHIDetectionJob
describephidetectionjob.description: Grants permission to describe the properties of a PHI entity detection job that you have submitted

describerxnorminferencejob.name: DescribeRxNormInferenceJob
describerxnorminferencejob.description: Grants permission to describe the properties of an RxNorm linking job that you have submitted

describesnomedctinferencejob.name: DescribeSNOMEDCTInferenceJob
describesnomedctinferencejob.description: Grants permission to describe the properties of a SNOMED-CT linking job that you have submitted

detectentitiesv2.name: DetectEntitiesV2
detectentitiesv2.description: Grants permission to detect the named medical entities, and their relationships and traits within the given text document

detectphi.name: DetectPHI
detectphi.description: Grants permission to detect the protected health information (PHI) entities within the given text document

infericd10cm.name: InferICD10CM
infericd10cm.description: Grants permission to detect the medical condition entities within the given text document and link them to ICD-10-CM codes

inferrxnorm.name: InferRxNorm
inferrxnorm.description: Grants permission to detect the medication entities within the given text document and link them to RxCUI concept identifiers from the National Library of Medicine RxNorm database

infersnomedct.name: InferSNOMEDCT
infersnomedct.description: Grants permission to detect the medical condition, anatomy, and test, treatment, and procedure entities within the given text document and link them to SNOMED-CT codes

listentitiesdetectionv2jobs.name: ListEntitiesDetectionV2Jobs
listentitiesdetectionv2jobs.description: Grants permission to list the medical entity detection jobs that you have submitted

listicd10cminferencejobs.name: ListICD10CMInferenceJobs
listicd10cminferencejobs.description: Grants permission to list the ICD-10-CM linking jobs that you have submitted

listphidetectionjobs.name: ListPHIDetectionJobs
listphidetectionjobs.description: Grants permission to list the PHI entity detection jobs that you have submitted

listrxnorminferencejobs.name: ListRxNormInferenceJobs
listrxnorminferencejobs.description: Grants permission to list the RxNorm linking jobs that you have submitted

listsnomedctinferencejobs.name: ListSNOMEDCTInferenceJobs
listsnomedctinferencejobs.description: Grants permission to list the SNOMED-CT linking jobs that you have submitted

startentitiesdetectionv2job.name: StartEntitiesDetectionV2Job
startentitiesdetectionv2job.description: Grants permission to start an asynchronous medical entity detection job for a collection of documents

starticd10cminferencejob.description: Grants permission to start an asynchronous ICD-10-CM linking job for a collection of documents

startphidetectionjob.description: Grants permission to start an asynchronous PHI entity detection job for a collection of documents

startrxnorminferencejob.description: Grants permission to start an asynchronous RxNorm linking job for a collection of documents

startsnomedctinferencejob.name: StartSNOMEDCTInferenceJob
startsnomedctinferencejob.description: Grants permission to start an asynchronous SNOMED-CT linking job for a collection of documents

stopentitiesdetectionv2job.name: StopEntitiesDetectionV2Job
stopentitiesdetectionv2job.description: Grants permission to stop a medical entity detection job

stopicd10cminferencejob.description: Grants permission to stop an ICD-10-CM linking job
